sense.def:
Dejanje ali odločitev je
a precedent
, kadar se ljudje pozneje sklicujejo nanjo, ko nameravajo tudi sami narediti nekaj podobnega.

seg.quote: The Supreme Court had already set a precedent.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
a precedent for something
označujemo, da se je nekaj podobnega zgodilo že kdaj prej.

seg.quote: There was no precedent for the riots.
He broke with precedent by making his maiden speech on a controversial subject.
